summary: This is a brief email from an Assistant U.S. Attorney to an unnamed recipient, indicating the sender wants to discuss something about Jeffrey Epstein. It suggests ongoing legal or investigative communication regarding Epstein in August 2007.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email who wants to discuss something about Jeffrey Epstein with the recipient.

events.title: Email about Epstein
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney sends an email to an unnamed recipient stating they want to run something past them about Jeffrey Epstein.

locations.context: Office address of the Assistant U.S. Attorney.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney was actively communicating about Jeffrey Epstein in August 2007.
The communication suggests ongoing legal or investigative matters related to Epstein at that time.
The email is brief and does not specify the nature of what needed to be discussed.
